data.name: Last Soul - Prologue
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist the full version of Last Soul

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1566040/Last_Soul/


About the Game




Our Kickstarter preregistration page is now live. Preregister now so you don't miss out when Kickstarter goes live sometime soon. You won't want to miss out all the cool early-bird perks.

Last Soul is a 2d pixel art action platformer with a compelling story about a future where mankind has lost its will.

Welcome to LAST SOUL. Play like BOP, the only hero that humanity has in this wonderful sci-fi story. Learn to survive by shooting your way out of evils enemies and bosses ready to consume you.

Join our DISCORD community of amazing gamers, developers, and artists that suggest ideas for our game while having fun playing new updates.



  • Play as an AI robot tasked with saving humanity.
  • Explore and fight your way through 4 distinct regions, each with a variety of levels
  • Evolve your character through 3 stages of progression, unlocking new and more powerful weapons and abilities.
  • Master a suite of powers, including bullet time, jet pack, and shields.
  • Take on awesome boss enemies, or die trying.

GET YOURSELF ON THE LOOP OF THIS CREATION


Join our Newsletter and get access to demos and free codes of our game before release day. You'll be able to play our Player-Test by registering your email.

data.short_description: Last Soul is a 2d pixel art action platformer with a compelling story about a future where mankind has lost its will. Explore and fight your way through a variety of levels, and take on awesome boss enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equiv. 2Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equiv. 2Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina or later
  • Processor: Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: glibc 2.15+, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
